forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. West wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 47. West northwest wind 6 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
Today unfolds in Downtown San Francisco with a gentle push of the breeze, promising mostly sunny skies after the morning's soft cloud cover. The temperature hovers subtly around the mid-fifties, gradually descending to a cooler embrace as afternoon wraps its arms around the city. With a westward wind brushing through at a leisurely pace, the day appears crisp yet inviting, encouraging wanderings through the neighborhood or a leisurely stop at one of the many cafés, perhaps a spot with a view of the ever-magnificent Golden Gate Bridge. 

As day turns to evening, expect the gradual settling of serenity as clear skies give way to a cool night, where the mercury dips to a comfortable 47 degrees. This evening is ideal for quiet strolls under the stars, maybe along the Embarcadero, with a light jacket or sweater providing just the right warmth against the gentle night air. While the coastal fog may reserve its presence for later, today beckons, inviting locals and visitors alike to engage with the urban tapestry in all its clarity and charm.
